title: An Experiment with Werewolves, Part 1
description: It's been almost three years since Taya Raveen first set foot in the Blackfoot Werewolf Reservation. After being unwillingly turned into a werewolf and then forced to leave the pack to live as a lone wolf, all hope of a cure for the werewolf condition quickly faded away.Life was hard but manageable. With the true alpha by her side, Taya learned to live off the land and love a man who had once taken her against her will.But when she receives a letter announcing that the werewolves are being freed, Taya's world quickly turns upside down. Tough decisions have to be made that could separate her from her lover forever.
author: K. Matthew
